about_the_game:
Synopsis

You and your co-worker Nanako have always had a bitter rivalry. Finally, on the order of your boss, you two have to cooperate for once. What bottled up feelings will this predicament reveal? Will it reignite your long-lost feelings for Nanako? Where did it all go wrong between you and her? And how will she eventually help you to reconnect what you've lost in touch with: that there is more to life than just being a productive workaholic?

A Visual Novel for the Heart

Office Rivals is a slice-of-life indie visual novel inspired by wholesome doujin and webtoons; the kind of a feel good story to experience on a nice day with a nice cup of tea or coffee!

Features

  • Inspired by the "wholesome" doujinshi tag, for fans of the genre!

  • Hand-drawn character sprites, background art, and scenes!

  • Spicy frame-by-frame animations!

  • A story that's not just about love and lust, but also trust and friendship!

  • Playtime for steady readers: about 6 hours.

Settings and Story

  • A flawed protagonist: the protagonist is not a perfect ladies' man or a knight in shining armor. He is a talented and well-dressed company star, but he is also a workaholic with insecurities and trust issues.

  • Grounded characters with relatable personalities, life challenges, and daily worries: not everyone has the perfect life, and by helping his colleagues with their problems, the protagonist also learns new things about himself.

  • An 'authentically Asian' setting: Heart City is a fictional city that's inspired by real-life places, settings and cultures. For example, the protagonist's love for eel noodles that shows his soft side.

Characters

Love interest:

Nanako Takagi, 29, is the protagonist's coworker and work rival. Talented and beautiful, she secretly has feelings for him. But what attracts her to him? And how did their rivalry start?

Colleagues:

  • Seon: The company's boss who tries to balance between being strict with being caring.

  • Gee: Upbeat and easy-going, but nervous about meeting his girlfriend's parents.

  • Michelle: Composed and dedicated, with an underlying fear of coming out of her shell.

  • Other coworkers: Hanie, Liem, intern Mami, and Sayori.

Other characters:

  • Isamu: Someone from Nanako's past! Smug, rich and arrogant!

  • Yejin: The boss' wife who can help the protagonist with his workaholism.

  • Emi: Gee's girlfriend who likes to talk about scary rumours!

  • Mei and Min: The father-and-daughter duo who run the late night food stall the protagonist likes to visit.

And more characters in the latter chapters!

Spicy Moments

  • Despite not being the only focus of the story, the visual novel features erotic scenes, such love-making after date, risky public encounters, and naughty talks during a company meeting...

  • Frame-by-frame animation, hand-drawn 2D art!

  • Early in their relationship, the lovers have protected sex, thus building up the protagonist's desire to creampie Nanako, and eventually, the option to knock her up, if they want to play with fire...

  • Some spices: paizuri, oral sex, nipple play/rub/fuck, exhibitionism, impregnation, lactation, and others!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has erotic scenes which can be described as mostly 'vanilla', but does have short instances of voyeurism. All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

short_description: Office Rivals is a visual novel and a love story between two-rivals-turned-lovers, inspired by wholesome and vanilla doujinshi. It's a drama and slice-of-life tale about love, friendship, and trust, with an equal amount of steamy and spicy scenes!
